title: Session Duration Estimation
description: Please estimate how long you will use this resource. This helps with resource planning and ensures fair access for all users.
maxTimeWarning: Maximum session time for this resource is {{maxTime}} minutes.

estimatedDuration.label: Estimated Duration (minutes)
estimatedDuration.error: Duration cannot exceed the maximum session time

notes.label: Session Notes (optional)
notes.placeholder: What will you be working on?
